revised_title: The Dangers of Mixing Chemicals: A Cautionary Tale
tldr: A paper-stainer named Mr. Butler accidentally endures severe chemical burns while experimenting with verdegris, falsegold leaf, and aqua-fortis. The reaction caused intense pain, swelling, and blisters across his body. After several days of treatment, including sweating, medication, and a hot water bath with wood ashes, Mr. Butler eventually recovered from the incident. This case study highlights the importance of safety precautions when working with chemicals.
